Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 26th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2012...
Injured on 4/25/2013 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/16/2017 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/4/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/20/2018 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2019, off Josh Johnson (WSH)...
Earned first career win on 4/28/2019...
Hit first career homerun on 7/14/2019, off Jimmy Nelson (TOR)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2019, going 15-9, 3.83 ERA...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to New York (A) on 3/2/2020 (Going to NYA: P K. Zimmer, SS F. Galvis. Going to LAN: SS C. Gehringer Jr., 3B K. Lobdell, P C. Coplin)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2021, going 3-0, 0.67...
Injured on 7/20/2021 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
